instances.speaker: mcrpg:gunter
instances.message: Hello! Looking to buy? Or just looking to look?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:gunter
instances.message: Heh, if I had an emerald for everytime I heard that...

instances.speaker: mcrpg:gunter
instances.message: Sorry. but this isn't a pawn shop. I can't afford to buy whatever crap you find in some dungeon.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:gunter
instances.message: Just like I told your orange-haired friend, I could never find a use nor a buyer for some giant magic fork that she found.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:gunter
instances.message: So, unless it's a sack of emeralds you've got on ya. I can't give you anything.
